      private static Pattern DatatypeFactory.XDTSCHEMA_YMD
      http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-datamodel/#xdtschema defines two regexps to constrain the value space of dayTimeDuration ([^YM]*[DT].*) and yearMonthDuration ([^DT]*).
